ENT/HRV and A(H1N1)pdm09 were the most common viruses detected in 214 (62%) and 71 (206%) outbreaks. of the 71 outbreaks in which ENT/HRV was detected, 39 (549%) occurred in CSDs, 21 (296%) in LTCFs, and 18 (8%) in other facilities.
